Key Match Events: Will Benson hit a three-run home run in the 7th inning, turning the game in favor of the Reds.
Emilio Pagán allowed a critical three-run home run by Seth Brown in the 8th inning, leading to the loss.
Post-Match Reflections: Reds manager David Bell emphasized the importance of the game for the team's playoff hopes.
Emilio Pagán expressed frustration over a crucial mistake in the 8th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Reds are now 63-70 and 10 games back in the National League Wild Card race after the loss.
